name: Laws of Karma — #7 Law of Focus
description:
Not a normal cat with 9 lives. He’s an archer catto with immortality. Although he had all the time in the world, he chose to focus only one thing: being a reliable protector of the realm.

You could meet him when the sun had set, up above the sky, patrolling with his lifetime partner: a golden Koi fish.

From him, we learn that in life focusing on too many thoughts might be energy draining. Thus, choose your focus. Pour your heart out into that thing. You’ll be amazed of how much rewarding it will become.
